scripts:
set properties on /content/dam/eaem-page-replicate-restriction/jcr:content
  set cq:conf{String} to /conf/eaem-page-replicate-restriction
  set jcr:title{String} to "AEM Page Replicate Restriction Provider"
end
create service user eaem-embargo-service with path system/experience-aem

set ACL for eaem-embargo-service 
  allow crx:replicate on /content 
  allow jcr:read, rep:write on / 
 end
